game.title: Lost Explorer
game.objective: Find the lost explorer and bring him back to camp.
game.description: The explorer went missing during a solo expedition in the nearby forest. You need to find him before nightfall.
game.reward: 10 gold pieces and a map fragment

tasks.objective: Search the eastern part of the forest
tasks.description: Look for signs of the explorer's passage in the dense woods.
The explorer might have followed the river to find water or escape danger.

tasks.objective: Climb the hill with the ancient ruins
tasks.description: The explorer was last seen near an old ruin. Be cautious, as the structure might be unstable.
